characters.jack: Jack is a young traveler with short, slightly messy brown hair and bright green eyes. He wears a beige short-sleeved button-up shirt with brown buttons, khaki cargo shorts, and sturdy brown hiking boots. He carries a medium-sized blue backpack with a single strap over one shoulder. His wide-brimmed sunhat is slightly oversized, often tilting awkwardly on his head.
characters.taxi_driver: A middle-aged Egyptian man with short black hair, a mustache, and deep brown eyes. He wears a loose-fitting white short-sleeved shirt with a few buttons undone at the top, dark gray pants, and black sandals. He has a friendly, amused expression most of the time.

places.cairo_airport: A bustling airport exterior with taxis and travelers. The background features modern airport signage, palm trees, and a warm, golden sky. The pavement is well-maintained, with clear lane markings for taxis and buses. No texts are visible.
places.inside_the_airport: A busy airport interior with travelers and luggage. The space is filled with modern airport amenities like check-in counters, security gates, and departure boards. The lighting is bright and the atmosphere is bustling with activity.
places.cairo_street: A chaotic urban street filled with honking cars, yellow taxis, motorcycles. Buildings in the background are a mix of modern and traditional architecture, with beige and pastel-colored facades. The streets are lined with small shops.
places.pyramids_pizza: A small, vibrant pizza restaurant. The front has large glass windows showing people inside enjoying pizza. The surrounding area is busy, with people walking and cars passing by.
places.pyramids_mall: A large, modern shopping mall with a sleek, glass-fronted exterior. Shoppers can be seen walking in and out, and a parking lot full of cars is in the foreground.
places.giza_pyramids: The vast desert landscape of Giza, featuring one Great Pyramid in the background. The sand is golden and warm, with occasional camel footprints. The sky is clear blue with a few wispy clouds.
